selectedCatalogInfoText: The question will be assigned to:
exampleQuestion: If **** were invisible for one day, what would they do?
questionTutorial: Type **** to make the question about any player in the game
waitingQuietMode: Wait until the randomly selected player chooses the correct answers
haveFunAndEnjoyGame: Have fun and enjoy the game.
aiLiveTranslationTooltip: Enable to have AI translate questions and answers into your language during the game. Leave disabled to play in the original language.

title: Title

tooltip.toStartGameChooseQuestions: To start the game, you must select a set of questions.
tooltip.startNewGame: All guests in the room must confirm participation before the game can start.
tooltip.privateQuestionsDescription: Use your own created questions in the game.
tooltip.publicQuestionsDescription: Use public questions created by other users. These questions are approved by the administration.
tooltip.roomOnListDescription: Allow your room to appear publicly so others can join without a code.
tooltip.useDixitRules: Don't let all players choose your answer. You earn points by selecting the answer of the player about whom the question is asked.

info.passwordRoom: * Without setting a password, anyone can join your room.
